This is an amazing game! So fun, it is just the perfect amount of comedy and challenging puzzles. Wheatly is byfar the best character that has ever existed in a video game, I love the little moron. The ending is amazing, never expected it, and gives you a stisfying feeling. Buy this game while you can. I 100% reccommend it!

No necesita analisis, una obra maestra. De lo mejor que jugue.

Portal 2 has been a very nice game. It is better than Portal 1, which I watched and just showed stuff on destroying GLaDOS. Now, it shows more story line in to it. When Wheatley took over the facility, I thought that I am free from the evil of GLaDOS. Then the plot twist, suddenly in a pico-second the story switched around by Wheatley (a trying to be compassionate GLaDOS) and GLaDOS ( a suddenly Compassionate Wheatley). At that second I was confident that bending the storyline was amazing. 

[b]Portal 3[:/b]
I want Portal 3, valve. Maybe you should make it like this, GLaDOS trys to catch you since a EMP destroyed all her testing robots except her for one reason. So she asks her to help her, or she will use her as a test subject again, since the reason of her being gone disappered by a EMP. As they figure out, Wheatley is the reason this is happening, so he can defeat GLaDOS, Dogg Ratman will no longer hide from the ruins of secret panels hidden in Apeture Science and they can live together as friends.

this is seriously a game i could play over and over again. ive already completed it three times now, and its just absolutely lovely. the music during certain scenes are able to draw you in like nothing else, loud and machine-like and completely aperture. i dont think ill ever get over how many lines are in the game (13,000? my god) which just really shows how much care and effort was put into producing this game. if you like a great soundtrack, great character banter, and overall amazing immersive storytelling, then play this game.

I just can't believe how unbelievable this game is...

I've owned this game on xbox for over 5 years now, and I still come back to play it sometimes on PC. It offers an incredible story, complete with fun, and challenging puzzles. The gameplay is perfect, and the soundtrack just fits right in. You don't even need to play the first game to understand what's going on. You just feels a bond with all of the characters, especially Wheatley. Throughout the whole game you just feel like he's always by your side, here to help you, even when he... well... I don't want to spoil anything. The dialouge is funny and interesting as well. 

Singleplayer is a masterpiece, but co-op is very fun as well. If you have a friend with Portal 2, you can both hop into the laboratory and work together to solve well thought of puzzles and dangers.

If you don't have this game, please, buy it ASAP. For $20, it is really worth it, but on sale it can go down to $2-$5! Go ahead and pick this game up on steam. It is one of the best games I have ever played in my life.
Completed the single player in 15 hours, spent most of that time looking at walkthroughs because I didn't know how to do anything in this game. Good game still

This is awesome

La mecanica de los portales es impresionante, puzzles muy originales que te hacen pensar, una dificultad justa para mi gusto, personajes con mucho carisma, una historia atrapante y secretos y detalles que abundan. Me encanta este juego y se lo recomiendo a todo el mundo (si es que hay alguien a estas alturas que no lo conozca).

MUY BUENO! ... la verdad , yo no juego juegos de un jugador , solo online , por que de a uno me aburro (el ultimo que jugué fue GOW  y eso fue ahce como 3 o 4 años) , pero me dio la curiosidad de jugar este , y me entraron las ganas de volver a jugar los juegos de un jugador :D... el final fue epico y bonito , y las canciones tambien eran buenas :D!... lo recomiendo al 100% , y ahora creo que jugare el online noma :(... no se si se pueda hacer mucho mas o si?
冬季特惠 的时候入手的，非常不错的解密游戏，能让我们深入游戏的探索之中，而且传送门有自己独特的世界观系统，能让我沉浸在对整个世界观的探索之中，让我一直想要了解在这个世界中究竟发发生了什么。同时，我也希望可以看到V社用新的起源引擎开发传送门的续作，不过大概是有生之年了吧.....
Juste excellent. Je vous conseille de jouer au 1 avant de commencer la campagne du 2. Pour le multi ce n'est pas spécialement nécessaire.
